item.title: How to Add Syntax Highlighting, Line Number Clipboard Js in Go Hugo Website
item.description: Installing Pygmentation first you have to download python Pygments in your machine. In mac you can easily download by pip install Pygments . If you use ubuntu sudo apt-get install python3-pygments adding pygmentsUseClasses in config.toml file pygmentsUseClasses=true generate chroma style using hugo gen command hugo gen chromastyles --style=monokai > static/css/syntax.css // for more info run following command hugo gen chromastyles -h I have used monokai theme. There are a lot of themes available.
